name: DeleteOauthDelegations
description:
Revoke OAuth app access for a user or account.

Use this tool to delete all OAuth delegations, revoking app access for specified users or accounts on PagerDuty. This action requires reauthorization to regain access.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the user whose OAuth delegations will be deleted.

value_schema.description: The ID of the user for whom this request is applicable.

parameters.name: delegation_type
parameters.description: Specify the OAuth delegation type(s) to target: 'mobile' for mobile app or 'web' for web app sign-out. Multiple types can be separated by commas, for example, 'mobile,web'.

value_schema.description: The type of OAuth delegations this request should target. Allowed values are 'mobile' (to sign users out of the mobile app) and 'web' (to sign users out of the web app). You can pass one or more types in, separated by commas (e.g., type=web,mobile).

parameters.name: accept_header_version
parameters.description: The versioning header for the API request, specified in the 'Accept' header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specify the content type of the request. Must be 'application/json'.
